item.description:
We're continuing in July with another of our famous Cashflow Meetups! ANY EXPERIENCE LEVEL IS WELCOME!! We always have some who have never played before as well as veterans.

We will shoot for having a 202 board, but as always we reserve that board for those who have gotten out of the Rat Race at least five times.

 
We'll be meeting in the lobby of the Marino Rec Center at NU's campus.  There are plenty of places nearby to grab something to eat and drink too.  


There is parking on Hemenway Street. Even though it says Fenway Resident, I have never gotten a ticket there. However, if you do, you're on your own. If you have any trouble finding us, please feel free to call my cell (617-519-3163).


PLEASE BE ON TIME!!! We will start PROMPTLY at noon.  We stop the game at 2:45pm to allow for some debrief and discussion afterward.

 

BRING YOUR PENCILS AND YOUR CALCULATORS!!


We're looking forward to seeing you ALL there on Sunday July 10!

Russ

617-519-3163
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the Purple Bag and the Cashflow Board Game
item.name: Play Cashflow!!
